roleset.name: hold, as by hands
roleset.note: CLASP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clasp' based on sentences in brown. (from clasp.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: second thing held, or attribute of arg1

example.name: usually with 'hands'
example.text: [*-1] Clasping his hands behind his head, he-1 stared at the blue sky.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: Rachel clasped her hands together and slowed her pace.

example.name: not an attribute
example.text: One day when he attended a war memorial ceremony inWestminster Abbey ... someone-3, [*-3] clasping him by the arm,whispered, ``I want a word with you, please''.
